comments.text:
There are two legitimate reason she has to be pissed about that.

First, that someone thought it was funny to tell stupid people that wasn't 
the case. Yes, I know that you don't get out just 'cause the law changed, 
you know it she knows it, but there are people that don't don't know it. 
That someone thought it was funny to spread disinformation that sounds *just 
close enough* to reality that a lot of people will believe it, that's 
stupid. When talking about things like the Onion, their stories are always 
over the top enough that no sensible person should believe it, but 
something like that story? You can't deny that there a plenty of people *who 
don't know how the law works* that may believe the story.

Second, that there are 'journalists' that would take that story and run it. 
That there are *multiple* groups who's job it is to report on things and 
spread information to the public would be so stupid and ignorant as to run 
such a story is really telling about how little quality news stations there 
are out there.
comments.author: reaperoa

comments.text:

a parody news website created a fake story, but that legitimate news 
agencies reported it as fact AND a police chief parroted the same fake 
story to a Senate Judicial Committee in order to bolster his case.

A fake news website has every right to print whatever nonsense they want, 
it's supposed to be the onus of the "real" news agencies to actually check 
their facts, especially when it comes to such a specious and ridiculous 
story as this.

exception to that rule, but it's a matter of probability. You'd have to 
actively try to overdose with extreme amounts, but you'd probably go to 
sleep before it actually does anything.﻿

comments.author: NairuOnLife

comments.text:
It's not possible to overdose on marijuana. People overdose on opiates, for 
example, because we have opiate receptors on or close our brain stem, which 
controls such bodily functions as breathing. Cannabinoid receptors are 
uncommon to nonexistent on the brain stem. The only way an overdose could 
occur is if the marijuana were laced with another drug--and even then, 
you'd be overdosing on the other drug, not the marijuana. This, among other 
reasons, is why the nation should follow in Colorado's footsteps. Not only 
will states generate a massive amount of tax revenue, but they will also 
take power away from the violent drug cartels and give citizens an 
alternative to purchasing marijuana that may be potentially laced with 
another drug.
comments.author: WhatsUpHufflepuff

comments.text:

top_comment.text:
I agree that people who are against marijuana at this point are severely 
ill informed, however I disagree with Ana on her assertion that anyone who 
makes a ruling or cast a vote regarding marijuana has to smoke/eat it. 
There are other ways to learn about things, I don't need to consume cyanide 
in order to know that it's poisonous. I never consumed marijuana in my 
life, but I learned through other means that the dangers of cannabis have 
been SEVERELY overstated, and there is good evidence for real health 
benefits.

This police chief is a fucking idiot who just cherry picked ANYTHING to 
support his preconceived biases. It's no different than creationism, or 
global warming deniers, they are just pushing an agenda. That's not honest, 
and you're only hurting yourself when you cling on to demonstrably false 
beliefs. As an intellectually honest person, I want to have as many true 
beliefs as possible, and as few false beliefs as possible, whether I like 
the truth or not.﻿
top_comment.author: EnigmaHood

Now with all that said, cannabis' effects are not demonstrably harmful 
enough to make it illegal. In fact there are some health benefits to 
consuming it, especially for certain health conditions.

top_comment.author: Tal Moore

comments.text:
+Honeydump95 Okay, I did the math. THC has an LD50 of about 0.5g per Kg 
body weight (as measured on rats). We might extrapolate that to mean a 60 
kg person (150lbs.) would need to intake 30g of THC to have a 50/50 chance 
of dying from overdose. If we assume average quality weed has about 5% 
concentration of THC, that would mean a 150lb person would need to smoke 
500g of weed to risk a 50% chance of death. If we assume the average joint 
has about 0.5g of weed that means a person would need to smoke 1,000 joints 
to have a 50% chance of death. So I stand corrected.
comments.author: Tal Moore

comments.text:
Yeah, I don't think that is correct, matter of a fact, I know it isn't. If 
a person smoked 20 joints in over 10 minutes, the last thing they would 
need to worry about is THC OD. If they did die, which they wouldn't, they 
would likely just pass out, they would most likely die of smoke inhalation/ 
something carbon dioxide related. They have actually injected and 
"overdose" of pure thc, ( an incredible amount) into a dog, and the dog 
slept for like 36 hours and woke up completely fine.

comments.text: +Arthur McArthur who the hell cares what you think is funny?
comments.author: mmarieden

comments.text: Oh, was that a joke? Was I suppose to laugh?
comments.author: Arthur McArthur

top_comment.text:
"What kind of moron thinks that you can overdose on marijuana?"
The same kind of moron that thinks Joan of Arc was Noah's wife.  ;)﻿
top_comment.author: Talladega Tom

comments.text: Priceless lool
comments.author: Andre Koala

comments.text:
Obviously that lesbian bitch was Noah's wife's mistress. You know, the one 
she got involved with after Pussy Eating Pamela.
comments.author: fordhouse8b

comments.text: Joan of Arc wasn't Noah's wife? What was she then, his wench?
comments.author: theshadowify

comments.text:
The day the rumor broke out this crazy lady came up to me and my sis and 
law and told us peopel were OD'ing in CO from weed. I told her thats 
interesting because its NEVER happened in recorded history.  Most non toxic 
substance on earth.  It makes you wanna eat for christ sake....
comments.author: Cameron Voss

top_comment.text:
I hate the "you have to try it to have any say in it" its the stupidest 
line of thinking you can come up with.  I don't jump in front of a moving 
semi just to see if it is good or bad for me.

Regardless of what pot does or doesn't do,  don't make that stupid argument 
please.﻿
top_comment.author: mewimi

comments.text:
+mewimi
That's right. Now read my comment again. :D
comments.author: Kancho

comments.text:
+napornik Actually no... that isn't what Ana "meant" because it isn't even 
close to what she said.  It is the same typical dogma from drug users and 
alcoholics I've heard for years... "You don't do it, so you aren't allowed 
to judge or have an opinion on it!"  

Going by that line of reasoning, we are saying that since you do not do any 
thing/crime personally you cannot be the one to have any common sense on 
the matter.  So what say you on theft, murder,  and all that other negative 
stuff along this line?

In reality it is just an irrational saying for ones own personal ambitions.
comments.author: mewimi

comments.text:
+Enjoyme
That's not what she said. And therefore +mewimi is correct. Ana is dumb 
beyond belief. You can't expect people passing laws to be educated in depth 
on everything *nor* can one expect them to eat fire retardants before 
prohibiting their use in baby pillows.
comments.author: Kancho

comments.text: +Enjoyme lol please don't.
comments.author: mewimi

comments.text:
Next time we're trying to legalize jumping infront of semi's, I'll let you 
know lol.

What Ana meant was that laws shouldn't be made by people who don't have an 
understanding of the subject. Unless it's something of common sense(murder, 
theft, etc), people should be required to be very educated about what 
they're prohibiting.
comments.author: Enjoyme

top_comment.text:
Anna, your as fake as they come. And you piss me and real Americans off. 
Dumbass commie bitch﻿
top_comment.author: Urban Deployment

comments.text:
+Mystogan Edolas I think you being unable to rebut my true statement is a 
fail. Anna believes in full government control. Even to the point of 
government taking over private businesses.
comments.author: Urban Deployment

comments.text: No true Scotsman argument = fail.
comments.author: Mystogan Edolas

top_comment.text:
If Ana ran for president of the world she had better use her boobs as a 
main part of her campaign, rather than her brain.﻿
top_comment.author: germandrummer13

comments.text: What brain?
comments.author: disinfect777

comments.text: +LizziesKindaBeast you're beautiful.
comments.author: 2075yr

comments.text:
You're German. Of course you'd say that. Go back to watching your anal 
porn. Haha xD jk<3
comments.author: LizziesKindaBeast

comments.text: Why do you say that ?
comments.author: 2075yr
